text: Design and implement cloud infrastructure using Terraform and AWS for 50+ microservices.
Manage Kubernetes clusters serving 10M+ requests daily with 99.99% uptime.
Automate deployment pipelines reducing release time from hours to minutes.
Mentor junior engineers on cloud best practices and DevOps methodologies.
Reduced cloud costs by $500K annually through resource optimization.
Built self-service platform enabling developers to deploy independently.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitLab CI and Docker.
Managed AWS infrastructure including EC2, RDS, S3, and Lambda.
Set up monitoring and alerting with Prometheus and Grafana.
